text: Wa Mina Al-'Ibili Athnayni Wa Mina Al-Baqari Athnayni Qul 'Aldhakarayni Harrama 'Ami Al-'Unthayayni 'Amma Ashtamalat `Alayhi 'Arhamu Al-'Unthayayni 'Am Kuntum Shuhada'a 'Idh Wassakumu Allahu Bihadha Faman 'Azlamu Mimmani Aftara `Ala Allahi Kadhibaan LiyuÄ‘illa An-Nasa Bighayri `Ilmin 'Inna Allaha La Yahdi Al-Qawma Az-Zalimina
